item.title: anatomy of lily
item.media:title: anatomy of lily
item.media:description:
Invictus file 8 Lilian Ivy Crestmere

                Last but definitely not least is our lovely British lady Lilian Crestmere, the proverbial dagger beneath England’s table for decades she has more combat experience than just about any of us save immortals like Hecryn.  A mutant from a prestigious lineage of nobles she was destined for military service before her birth due to her family customs.  Her father a mutant and career military man and a knighted champion, he is head of the household and has been alive for five hundred years, likewise her mother was a daughter of the former Duke of Cornwall and a potent mage.  Frankly her blood couldn’t be any bluer if you took a marker to it.  Despite that her family tradition states that the eldest join her majesty’s army with no exception thus her fate when she reached enlistment age was sealed.  Her full mutant abilities manifested at age eight and when she was enlistment age she shapeshifted into male form and her father locked her in that form for a while and took away the rest of her post human abilities.  One would assume she’d be packed off to some fancy officer’s academy but instead she went in under an assumed alias (Ashley Winton) and had to work her way from the bottom. 

Basic physiology

                Lily despite being born on September 12th 1948 looks like a fit young british woman in her early twenties.  A lifetime on the front lines has given her a muscular build and a tolerance for bullshit in the negatives.  She is 5’8” 150lbs with light chestnut hair and bright green eyes, typically clad in whatever draws the least amount of attention and always carrying a concealable blade she always scans the area she’s in for trouble.  She is far stronger, faster, and tougher than even the most well trained humans.  She can teleport, read and assault minds, utilize illusion magic, heal much quicker than humanly possible and is a preternaturally gifted markswoman.

Skeletal structure

                In addition to her generally enhanced physiology Lily’s skeletal structure is quite resilient.  Made of the same material as normal human skeletons it is also covered with a thin layer of a material I have yet to identify.  This not only renders it far stronger than an ordinary human skeleton but allows for the same range of motion.  Other than that her skeleton functions just the same as anyone else’s.

Muscular structure

                Muscles that allow someone to lift twenty five tons over their heads like lily’s are serious business, Lily’s muscles produce far fewer fatigue toxins allowing her to keep going for weeks before feeling any sort of fatigue.  She can run at well over two hundred miles per hour (but with little maneuverability) and her musculature allows for a great deal of flexibility as well.  She can twist and contort in various positions and hold them without hurting herself.  Her ligaments and tendons can stretch much farther than even the most well trained persons granting her a high degree of flexibility and resilience.

Skin structure

                Lily’s skin, other than its overall resilience bears no great difference to a regular persons, combined with her muscles and skeleton it confers C class resilience meaning that high caliber rounds at short range are the best option for engaging her, most ltl tech (tear gas, tasers and the like) has no effect on her whatsoever.  Anything below that just tends to piss her off and I can assure you no one wants her pissed off.

Immune system

                Lily’s immune system is quite robust, I’ve never seen her catch a cold or flu and more virulent diseases like cancer last about a day before she recovers.  She used to smoke a lot before opting for electronic cigarettes, the different flavors were far more appealing to her than nicotine addiction.  She can get drunk and be affected by drugs but it takes a far higher dose (.8 bal for her to get drunk and lethal doses of drugs for her to get high) She can endure a thousand times more radiation than a normal person can before suffering any radiation poisoning and temperature extremes mean little to her outside of a vacuum.  Even when inebriated she seems to be able to activate a sort of secondary immune system to flush out toxins and sober up in a matter of seconds. 

Senses

                Lily’s senses are supplemented by her telepathy allowing her to iron sight something from miles off and when combined with a sight can let her spot folks in complete darkness or otherwise obscured.  Otherwise her senses are peak human.

Cardiovascular system

                Lily’s blood carries as much oxygen as anyone else, her body just makes much more efficient use of it.  She can function just fine in high altitude environments and her lungs can filter out any sort of nerve or chemical agent.  In truth chemical weapons just aggravate her immensely.  In addition her blood cells carry an advanced form of platelet that heals skin cells in seconds, torn muscles in minutes, and broken bones in hours (faster if she sets said bones).  She can also hold her breath for hours at a time minimizing her need for SCUBA gear in amphibious operations.  She (like serene) has far higher G tolerance than even the most well trained pilots.

Nervous system

                Lily’s nervous system is highly conductive giving her extreme hand eye coordination and reflexes.  She’s fast enough to dodge gunfire, and is an extreme threat in CQC.  Of course this makes her an incredible shot even without using her other abilities.  Along with her training and unique physiology she can shut down the pain from grievous injuries to keep going for months at a time. 

Brain

                Being a telepath Lily has a highly developed limbic system, she’s able to perceive emotions (both her own and others) far more clearly than even the most gifted interrogators.  She can supplant this to any of her normal five senses able to see, hear, touch, taste, and feel (tactile sense of course) emotion and thought.  The more powerful emotion the longer it lingers and some emotions are easier to find than others.  In addition she can stealth herself from telepathic inquiry, not so much a shield as an invisibility to telepathic detection as well as psychic invisibility.  In addition she possesses far greater 3-d situational awareness than most people, likely due to the fact she’s a teleporter. 

Career

                Lily has been a soldier since 1966 fresh out of army training she (or rather he at the time) was in an airborne army unit serving with the Australian parachute regiment during The Tet offensive.  It was during the battle of Kham Duc that her star truly shone.  She saved Captain John white of the 11th mobile strike force from a viet cong infiltrator, and in spite of the disaster that was kham duc she is credited with sniping an NVA commander outside of the city a shot from 2000 meters with a L1A1 self loading rifle.  This not only earned her several commendations but selection into the special air services.  However this was not before she saw action trying to hold the line during the Tet offensive where she is credited with saving hundreds of lives, her covering fire constantly peppering the Vietcong.  It was a tough decision for high command to lose such a sure shot but by the winter of 1968 she was on a plane back home to begin training with the SAS.  Taking the training even further she was trained as part of an elite unite of war mages known as the order of the orb.  The order of the orb or “utility mages” as they are more commonly known are a subset of british war mages well trained enough to contend with the rest of the worlds super soldiers.  The order of the orb focuses on utility magic spells and charms that aid their squads in battle by acting as a force multiplier or by misdirecting the enemy.  Lily showed great aptitude in a subset of lumiomancy that dealt with illusion magic.  Once her training was complete and it became clear that Vietnam was going to be unwinnable the powers that be decided she would be better utilized in Northern Ireland instead.  She was part of Operation Banner and from the parts of her record not completely obscured by black ink and mystic wards was involved in several operations against the most extreme branch of the Provisional IRA the Tuatha de Daunan famed for extreme secretarial violence, drawing high profile public support, and the public execution of “collaborators” to the British.  Despite her resourcefulness the Tuatha’s popular support and growing campaign of violence against the English, “unclean people” and Irish protestants stretched her and her team to the limit.  Then on May 5th 1987 the tuatha carried out a bombing of the Chunnel resulting in several deaths among them the children of then Prime Minister Margaret Thatcher and the children of several members of parliament.  This led to several events, first the provisional IRA cut any and all ties to the Tuatha and went to ground, second the british showed off one of their answers to nuclear proliferation throughout the world.  A week after the bombing forty challenger tanks appeared out of nowhere in Belfast and started leveling any building suspected of holding anyone associated with the IRA, minutes after that a full regiment of Royal Marines similarly appearing out of nowhere stormed every nook and cranny of northern Ireland killing or capturing any and all IRA members (or at that point anyone who looked at them sideways) in a campaign of rapid and often imprecise violence.  Lily and her team were deployed to the U.S. to ensure that stateside logistics were taken care of as well.  It was an operation that not only saw several remaining members of the state side IRA and the river rats and westies dead but a U.S. senator forcibly retired and then killed in the Adirondacks.  This operation among certain revelations of the U.S.’ conduct during Vietnam is credited among intelligence circles to the disbanding of NATO and the establishment of the European Federation and New Commonwealth formed by the U.K, Ireland, and Canada by 1989.  What remained of the IRA was rather eager to get into the peace process after the operation concluded deals were struck that included political concessions and prisoner exchange for reconstruction agreements.  A peaceable accord was likely brokered due to the threat of the Soviet Union and NATO’s disbanding.  After the troubles started winding down Lily was reassigned to MI:6 whereupon the seal on her powers placed by her father failed.  Since her abilities are mutant and thus have a biological component she had to endure hours of agony as her body grew new tissue to accommodate her abilities.  A full investigation was conducted into her post human capabilities and MI:6 was quite pleased to have such a versatile and well trained asset at its disposal.  She was used to great effect in a number of operations across several countries in the U.S., U.S.S.R., European Federation, China, Iran, Iraq, Afghanistan, Saudi Arabia, Nigeria, South Africa, Libya, and Mexico.  Through it all she was unquestioningly loyal, a vigilant shadow in her majestey’s name and her father couldn’t have been prouder.  However on a simple delivery mission to Saudi Arabia she saw something that changed her forever in the fall of 1992.  The mission was unusually straight forward, guard duty for a simple delivery but the details of the mission simply didn’t add up.  Throughout her career she had been tasked with the most difficult, most impossible, most high level missions MI:6 could offer and now she was being tasked with guarding a tanker ship full of what the manifest claimed was “miscellaneous goods”.  Her handler was rather brusque about the mission as well insisting that she “don’t mind the details and just get the job done.”  Then there were the other security measures for the ship, telepathic jammers, teleportation scramblers, and a crew of thirty mercs armed with high tech melee weapons instead of guns was even more off putting.  Her skill in espionage led her to disable the jammers long enough to see what the cargo really was.  Mutant girls, all adolescent and implanted with cybernetic behavior regulators, with Afghanistan’s fall and Iran joining the U.S.S.R. and the U.S. establishing a major presence in Isreal the rest of the Arab world wanted to enhance its standing superhuman forces, with the region’s stance on magic being what it was combat mages were a no go but mutants on the other hand could be bred.  Whoever supplied these children (five hundred in all) also fitted them with cybernetic regulators to make them compliant and included medical faculties and equipment to maximize mutant birth rates.  Five hundred adolescent girls with a wide range of post human abilities were essentially sold into sexual slavery something Lily could not abide.  So Lily did the only thing she could do, she shot her handler twice in the head, twice in the chest and proceeded to systematically execute the rest of the security detail.  The mercs stood little chance against a solder with her experience and training, with her post human abilities it could scarcely be called a fight.  As the smoke cleared, and as she had just made herself an enemy of the state she started to consider her options, everything looked rather grim until one of the cargo containers burst open and out stepped a man who was number 3 on the world’s most wanted list, Andrew Clay.  Clay said he had a plan to get the children to safety and thanks to contacting a group of folks dedicated to fighting human trafficking and exploitation was able to make good on his offer.  He managed to get the children to safety after a year of work, and then vowed to return to Saudi arabia to “set things right”.  With that Lily thought it would be best if she started running as by then she was surely blacklisted and placed at the top of MI:6’s shit list.  Andrew made good on his promise to pay Saudi Arabia a visit and proceeded to incite a revolution that overthrew the monarchy and saw it replaced with a parliamentary body (more on that later).  She’s been on the run since then and even after the world ended MI:6 (or rather what’s left of it) is still intent on hunting her down.

 

Skill set

                It should be noted that Lily has close to fifty years of combat experience before her powers were returned to her and training from some of the finest special forces the world has ever seen including but not limited to the Special Air Services, GIGN, Sheteyet 13, GSG9, GROM, EKO Cobra, Mossod, ASIS, DSGE, and Joint Task Force 2, MI6, MI5, and has extensive knowledge of CIA tactics and procedures.  She is a master when it comes to special operations and spycraft.  Though possessed of numerous skills (possessing a rating with anything that holds a bullet or a blade) she is a peerless sniper and demolitionist.  Years fighting the IRA led her to adopt their IED work into her own skills which she then refined throughout her career.  She is highly proficient (rating black E4) in Krav Maga an Israeli martial art that emphasizes bringing an opponent down as quickly and efficiently as possible.  She has worked extensively with Serene to further refine and hone her skill in krav maga, and combined with her superhuman attributes she can mow through groups of C+ to a single B rated super with little effort.  She is proficient in making IED’s from spare parts and household items, something she picked up during operations in Northern Ireland.  She is fluent (conversational level) in several languages (Russian, Chinese, Spanish, Irish, Afrikans, French, German, Arabic, Farsi, Romanian, Croatian, Polish, Japanese, Urdu, Vietnamese, American sign language, military sign) and can affect several regional dialects.  She can bluff with the best of them thanks to years at MI:6, and is astoundingly resourceful.  In addition she is a talented illusionist both mundane and mystic means of misdirection are available to her. Insubstantial clones, invisibility, phantom sounds, lights, and obscuring mists are readily available to her with effort she can make sabotaged items look and function normally until she decides to release the glamour.  Once that’s done object in question fails in a rather spectacular fashion, she normally saves this little trick for key parts of enemy infrastructure or equipment.  As a fully credited utility mage she can quick cast spells even in the midst of a fire fight.  In addition to helping her with krav maga, serene also helped refine her understanding of the street, the underworld and the art of the grift, Andrew and Anya taught her how to bolster her telepathic resistance, and I taught her the finer points of combat strategy.  She’s a master at customizing firearms to expand its capabilities, all of her weapons bear her own customizations, fore grips, expanded magazines, custom stocks and sights are all part of her arsenal.  She is an expert in operating a variety of vehicles be it land, sea or air civilian or military.  She has an insane level of knowledge when it comes to firearms and ballistics knowing the exact specifications of every firearm on the planet.  Her expertise allows her to look at a bullet hole and tell what caliber bullet was used, the type of firearm used, the range it was fired at, the type of ammunition used, the modifications on the gun, and the skill of the shooter in a matter of seconds. 

Power Set

                Lily has a diverse set of abilities that make her even more lethal than she already is.  We’ve already explored her strength, speed, and durability so we can focus on her extra normal attributes.  It should be noted that lily only recently got her powers and hasn’t been fully trained in them.  While they’ve she needs proper training in order to fully exploit them something we haven’t had time to do.    

Telepathy

                Lily is a C+ level telepath, she is capable of reading minds, sensing minds, shorting synapses via telepathic attack, shielding herself from telepathic detection, and communicating directly with a mind.  She cannot control a person’s thoughts or actions however so it’s not a be all end all for recon.  She has an impressive radius of fifty miles, at max range she can read surface thoughts, half that she can read deeper into what folks prefer not to say out loud, she needs eye contact to plumb someone’s subconscious.  She can tell if someone is under mystic geas or telepathic control as well.  Her telepathic attack works by direct stimulation of a targets pain centers, the resulting synaptic overload will incapacitate or kill even the hardiest of targets.  She has yet to learn how to dial her psychic attack down to incapacitate someone so this tends to be a backup option for her.  Her telepathy even lets her pick up uses of magic, or strong emotions left in an area fairly easily.  Though powerful her skill in telepathy is underdeveloped.  A weaker telepath of greater skill can elude or in some cases overwhelm her.  Though fairly safe from most mind control attempts a sufficiently powerful telepath can control her with considerable effort. Lilly is also capable of telepathic stealth rendering her undetectable to telepathic scans from all but the most powerful of telepaths.

Teleportation

                Lily is a C+ level teleporter giving her a range of fifty miles and preventing the worry of her ending up in something solid.  She can utilize her teleportation abilities offensively devastating living matter by displacing it forcibly.  She can take equipment and clothing with her, but not passengers so sadly she can’t just extract people with a touch.  Her teleportation makes no sound, and produces no light show or any other sort of non standard phenomena.  She simply fades from view and then into view up to fifty miles elsewhere.  She doesn’t even need line of sight to teleport, she describes it as fading away and having an overhead view of where she can go then she simply chooses to fade back in elsewhere.  However significant electromagnetic interference will prevent her teleportation ability, and offensive use of it requires total concentration preventing her from doing anything else.

Shapeshifting

                Lily is a C- shapeshifter able to alter her appearance, and shape but not mass.  She can fool guard dogs, visual inspection, retinal scans, fingerprints, but not DNA scanners.  She can’t form natural weaponry like claws or fangs or the like either.  Nonetheless her shapeshifting abilities in addition to her training have let her infiltrate the most secure buildings. 

Hyper marksmanship

                Lily is capable of making any weapon she holds operate far above its standard operating capabilities.  She can make projectiles fly at around mach fifteen making them capable of tearing reinforced armor apart, curve them around cover, make innocuous items into impromptu homing weapons, shape explosives so they obliterate a single target instead of a group, intercept bullets in mid flight with her own bullets, increase the firing rate of a weapon tenfold, and perform even crazier stunts with them.  It’s a trademark for her and made her one of the most lethal soldiers of the twentieth and likely twenty first century.  She seems to accomplish this by charging whatever she’s holding with a psychokinetic field that drastically alters how they interact with physical laws.  She can even double the clip size of any gun she wields by creating what I surmise are constructs of psionic energy that duplicates the rounds inside of the clip.  As per velocity and damage increase the bigger the round the more “oomph” she can put behind it this includes any weapon system she operates but if she puts too much energy in a round it goes off in her face with disastrous results.  Whenever she “charges” an object to break the laws of physics her eyes and whatever she’s holding tend to arc with a silver electrical field depending on the amount of energy she’s putting into something.

Combat

                Each of us have our own ways of dealing heaps of ultra violence on people, Serene has moves that make the matrix seem like amateur hour mcdajang “karate”, ED hits hard enough to red line the richter scale, Andrew will eat punches, stab wounds, bullets, and more and keep going, Anya looks like a ballerina or a whirlwind of claws and spikes, hecryn takes ridiculous risks that sees his enemies wind up as smears, I hit people when they can’t see me and harder when they can, and Verick sits back and lets his minions do the work.  Lily can best be termed as “anti climactic” one to the head and move on is her style of combat, just brutal economy of motion in dispatching anyone stupid enough to take a shot at her.  Krav Maga, years of weapon training and her own superhuman attributes makes her practically capable of winning world war 3 on her own.  As part of a unit she’s even more dangerous. 

Personality

                It bears mentioning that ninety nine percent of human kind has no clue what this woman has been through.  Being at war for close to forty years has made her salty, terse, laconic, unapologetic, and plainspoken on leave.  She doesn’t hold anything back no matter who she speaks to, unless she’s working someone she has a difficult time relating with people.  She does have traces of warmth though, a soft spot for the honest working man or any generally decent folk despite being born and raised a blue blood.  The suffering of regular people under the thumb of the influential is something she has a major problem with and is likely why she chose to join us.  Add in a great deal of cynicism and you’ve essentially got a porcupine with a heart of gold (and a concealed weapon somewhere on her person).  On mission lily is the epitome of cold calculating patience, as one of the best snipers on the planet she can wait for weeks, even month for the perfect opportunity to strike.  As per ethics Lily is essentially occam’s razor when she’s in a good mood, when she’s pissed she’ll find a way to make the offending party suffer for the rest of their lives.  She doesn’t always kill a scumbag, she will cripple them though.  Lily has spent her years on the run from people she trusted, it makes her slow to open up to people but there’s nothing more she values than a friend, which is sad considering how hard it is for her relate to most people.  A realist by nature she is often the one who points out the potential problems with our various plans and generally keeps our feet on the ground when we start getting too ambitious.  Lily may come off as an alcoholic with how much she drinks, but it simply takes way more alcohol to get her buzzed than a normal person.  That said she certainly does have a taste for beer, wine, and spirits and even brews her own sometimes though it tends to have quite a kick to it.  Lily believes in being prepared for anything, when she goes out she always has it in mind to blend with whatever the local populace is.  At any time she has a concealable blade, a flask (filled with water or booze) an E-cig, and playing cards.  Most of these items she keeps hidden via illusion magic.   

Tactical considerations

                Lily is part of the “shadow ops” of the Templar, she’s normally in the field with Serene while Anya is on backup and I normally run ops.  She has decades of experience in special ops and spycraft so she is typically the field leader in any shadow op we have to run.  Both her and Serene can infiltrate just about anything, mark targets of opportunity and leave before anyone is the wiser.  They are both proficient at socially engineering folks to flip all but the most willful of personnel.  With her powers in addition to her training she’s an extremely potent asset in any capacity. 

Team Relations

Niran “serene” Klahan

The two of them working together are the best field agents any covert ops runner could ask for.  They can slip into any building or organization, map it, and under most circumstances get out.  She has been Niran’s fuck buddy, confidant, and partner in crime.  The two of them and Anya like to stir up all sorts of trouble when on leave.  Niran and Lily are for lack of a more delicate term fuck buddies our work tends to invite loads of tension and we all have different ways of working it off.  Ed’s a soulless killing machine, Verrick don’t care, Andrew prays and meditates, Anya and hecryn have seen it all before but Niran and Lily well the fuck every now and again.  Frankly as long as it doesn’t interfere with our mission it’s all well and good.  Lily describes Niran’s mind as open inviting and intoxicating like a fly trap the strength of his emotions and sensory input can trap an unwary visitor in his mind.

EOD01

Lily has an outlook of concern when it comes to ED in action, it’s not every day you see someone use a whole sky scraper as a melee weapon or chuck a mountain.  She has described Ed’s mind as “simple, focused on survival more than anything else but there are some odd bits starting to show up.” 

Andrew Clay

Like all of us Lily thinks the world of Andrew, it was him that managed to get those mutant girls to safe homes instead of letting them become sex slaves.  She is determined to see Andrew’s vision of a finer world come to pass, a world where people like her won’t be necessary.  Lily describes andrew’s mind as an overwhelmingly bright light.  Like staring point blank into a quasar with a choral chant of infinite volume. 

Verrick Bulat

It’s not every day one gets to work with someone with a kill count that would make Hiencrich Himmler jealous.  Verrick is a monster and Lily knows it, hell we all know it but he’s indispensible to our stratagems so we tolerate him.  The actions of Verricks empire hit Lily closer than any of us since her old man actually fought Verricks armies back in the day.  Verrick for his part thinks of Lily as one more weapon to be utilized though his attitude is softening.  Verricks mind has been described as sinister beyond imagining a primordial darkness that invokes terrors long forgotten in the mind of any who visit.

Hecryn

Lily’s drinking buddy and smoking partner, you’d think they’d be fucking on a regular basis but fucking seems to be the furthest thing from either of their minds when they get together.  They compare scars, missions, tactics, and more.  Lily taught Hecryn how to use guns, and Hecryn instructed Lily in swordplay and archery which is far more useful than one would think.  In spite of how he conducts himself on and off the battlefield lily describes hecryns mind as constantly weighing options and risks.  Almost like a calculator.

Hector

We get each other, plain and simple she was SAS I was Delta we both are cut from the same cloth.  Athena has some foolish idea that I have feelings for her but frankly its absurd.  Lily is an asset and team member and she sees me the same way.  We have a job to do, and a damn worthwhile one too, I can put my heart on hold to see this thing through and so can she.  She describes my mind as simple at first glance but with countless facets and paths beneath the surface.  She says it’s fascinating to see it in action it’s flattering I guess.

Anya

If I had a shot for every time I heard “Fuck’s sake Anya get your sodding tits off the back of my head you knob” it would likely overwhelm my synthetic parts and cause me to shut down.    Anya likes to play little “pranks” on Lily and considering the world’s most dangerous predator going up against the world’s most well trained soldier makes for some classic fucking theatre.  They have this weird little relationship where one minute they’re bickering like kids and the next they’re in lock step with each other.  I’ve got dozens of PHD’s and doctorates, an augmented reality display that can make micro expressions as plain as day, and years of experience profiling folks, but damned if I can figure that shit out.  Lily says anya’s mind is like a child at play, even when she’s ripping someone in half. 

 

Equipment

                Lily has a number of guns and other assorted weaponry at her disposal, she favors function over modern tech so she only uses a few modern firearms.  She has eschewed modern charge weaponry for more familiar ballistics by and large.  The most used items in her arsenal are listed below.

Accuracy international A.W. 50

                A lovingly customized sniper rifle that pitches .50 BMG rounds at astonishing velocity, Lily has customized the rifle to convert it to a semi automatic configuration instead of the bolt action.  Enchantments in the chamber touches the propellant causing them to burn more completely and expand smoother resulting in a much higher muzzle velocity.  The sight is a british technomancy innovation known as a “Willow wisp” sight.  This nifty gadget can see living things through solid matter and instantly analyzes a person’s vital organs.  The magazine has been expanded as well holding ten rounds instead of the normal five.  An ingenious system of structural braces further dampens the already minimal recoil and another system of enchantments eliminates noise and muzzle flare.  The final enchantment on the gun allows the bullets to phase through solid inorganic matter and slide right into the squishy person underneath or behind.  The bullet will only phase through an inch of solid matter, after that physics takes over.

 

SA80E

                A venerable model of British assault rifle the SA80E is being phased out in favor of newer models.  The SA80E is a jack of all trades assault rifle, but with lily’s modifications it truly shines.  The foregrip and collapsible stock makes it very controllable in even the tightest of spaces further taking advantage of its bullpup design, and the reflex sight makes it ideally suited for close to mid range engagements.  Enchantments take hop up and recoil out of the gun and the expanded magazine allows for longer engagements.  The other enchantments and mechanical enhancements make the gun more rugged and robust able to take incredible abuse and punishment while operating perfectly.  She normally keeps a magazine on the rail and several combi magazines as well. 

Neosted 2000 c

                A compact magazine fed shotgun originating from South Africa lily has modified it extensively to pack even more of a punch than a normal shotgun.  This thing is not subtle every enchantment is centered around generating terrific muzzle velocity and impact force.  The enhanced force behind it requires someone with at least D rank strength to use one handed.  She has reinforced the weapon to withstand the force of the weapons recoil.  She keeps all manner of ammunition around for it as well, flechette, breaching, solid slug, rock salt, dragons breath, and so forth. 

Sig saur p226

                Wielded alone with an extended magazine this is essentially lily’s last resort firearm.  Enchanted to eliminate noise and muzzle flash and reinforced to withstand being used as a bludgeon and endure all manner of environments these are essentially the old faithful of lilly’s armory.

Compound bow

                It seems out of place for Lily to have a bow and arrow in her arsenal unless you consider the advantages a bow has, completely silent without magic or extra equipment, and retrievable ammo are still something firearms can’t do.  Furthermore some things just laugh when they get tiny little holes punched in them.  Lily’s bow has been modified to take advantage of her strength, the bow has a ten ton draw strength and is enchanted to bestow its arrows with a means to silence the sonic boom they cause when they fly as fast as they do.  The result of these arrows hitting someone is like watching princess mononoke. 

 

GE M134 minigun

                No subtlety here just good old American opposite of subtlety, enchanted to redirect heat into thermovoltaic cells the gun can fire ad nauseum as long as it has ammunition.  She has it belt fed and has a back pack unit that has been extensively modified to store ammunition extra dimensionally.  The backpack can hold ten thousand rounds at any given time before having to call upon more.  The rest of the ammunition is stored extra dimensionally and reloading the entire backpack unit takes thirty miniutes between full firing cycles.

 

Type 6 Rifle Resistant armor

                Commissioned from the European Federtion’s Lux Omnia Vinci initiative as a reward for helping secure some rather elusive assets this rifle resistant armor doesn’t stop bullets at all.  Using light manipulation technology the armor essentially baffles the perception of any around this has two benefits.  One it bestows a sort of psychic invisibility meaning everyone simply looks past or ignores her when she wears it.  Two when found the armor lets loose a sort of chaff that works on multiple modes of perception.  Sight, smell, hearing, even more exotic forms of detection are baffled subtly making would be gunmen or assailants miss by mere inches.  As anything more would immediately put an experienced shooter on guard and lead them to adjust their aim the wearer must still intelligently utilize cover to maximize the armor system’s effectiveness. 

Khonshu Tactical Hood

                A tactical hood that scrambles any facial recognition, thermal or x ray cam, or scrying and psychomancy attempts.  It also warps the wearer’s voice into something exceedingly menacing, projecting dominance and making even the most resolute gunmen lose their focus and their nerve.  The mask also lets the wearer see as if he or she is in a well lit room and can eliminate the obscuring affects of gas or fog.

Mountain man Camel back

                Capable of holding ten liters of water in an extra dimensional space taking a good deal of weight off of the soldier, it is enchanted to keep the liquid cold.  Nine times out of ten instead of water the camelback holds a sort of witch’s brew made by Commonwealth Apothecaries.  A liter can keep a soldier fed and hydrated for a whole day, special forces operators get a more potent variation of the brew called a soldier’s draught that gives them the benefit with just a sip.   Variations exist for different climates and aid a soldier immensely in survival situations.  In addition the brew can be poured on the skin to serve as a salve and disinfectant, and can purify rotten food.  It won’t close a bullet hole but it’ll make it a hell of a lot more bearable.

item.description:
Invictus file 8 Lilian Ivy Crestmere

                Last but definitely not least is our lovely British lady Lilian Crestmere, the proverbial dagger beneath England’s table for decades she has more combat experience than just about any of us save immortals like Hecryn.  A mutant from a prestigious lineage of nobles she was destined for military service before her birth due to her family customs.  Her father a mutant and career military man and a knighted champion, he is head of the household and has been alive for five hundred years, likewise her mother was a daughter of the former Duke of Cornwall and a potent mage.  Frankly her blood couldn’t be any bluer if you took a marker to it.  Despite that her family tradition states that the eldest join her majesty’s army with no exception thus her fate when she reached enlistment age was sealed.  Her full mutant abilities manifested at age eight and when she was enlistment age she shapeshifted into male form and her father locked her in that form for a while and took away the rest of her post human abilities.  One would assume she’d be packed off to some fancy officer’s academy but instead she went in under an assumed alias (Ashley Winton) and had to work her way from the bottom. 

Basic physiology

                Lily despite being born on September 12th 1948 looks like a fit young british woman in her early twenties.  A lifetime on the front lines has given her a muscular build and a tolerance for bullshit in the negatives.  She is 5’8” 150lbs with light chestnut hair and bright green eyes, typically clad in whatever draws the least amount of attention and always carrying a concealable blade she always scans the area she’s in for trouble.  She is far stronger, faster, and tougher than even the most well trained humans.  She can teleport, read and assault minds, utilize illusion magic, heal much quicker than humanly possible and is a preternaturally gifted markswoman.

Skeletal structure

                In addition to her generally enhanced physiology Lily’s skeletal structure is quite resilient.  Made of the same material as normal human skeletons it is also covered with a thin layer of a material I have yet to identify.  This not only renders it far stronger than an ordinary human skeleton but allows for the same range of motion.  Other than that her skeleton functions just the same as anyone else’s.

Muscular structure

                Muscles that allow someone to lift twenty five tons over their heads like lily’s are serious business, Lily’s muscles produce far fewer fatigue toxins allowing her to keep going for weeks before feeling any sort of fatigue.  She can run at well over two hundred miles per hour (but with little maneuverability) and her musculature allows for a great deal of flexibility as well.  She can twist and contort in various positions and hold them without hurting herself.  Her ligaments and tendons can stretch much farther than even the most well trained persons granting her a high degree of flexibility and resilience.

Skin structure

                Lily’s skin, other than its overall resilience bears no great difference to a regular persons, combined with her muscles and skeleton it confers C class resilience meaning that high caliber rounds at short range are the best option for engaging her, most ltl tech (tear gas, tasers and the like) has no effect on her whatsoever.  Anything below that just tends to piss her off and I can assure you no one wants her pissed off.

Immune system

                Lily’s immune system is quite robust, I’ve never seen her catch a cold or flu and more virulent diseases like cancer last about a day before she recovers.  She used to smoke a lot before opting for electronic cigarettes, the different flavors were far more appealing to her than nicotine addiction.  She can get drunk and be affected by drugs but it takes a far higher dose (.8 bal for her to get drunk and lethal doses of drugs for her to get high) She can endure a thousand times more radiation than a normal person can before suffering any radiation poisoning and temperature extremes mean little to her outside of a vacuum.  Even when inebriated she seems to be able to activate a sort of secondary immune system to flush out toxins and sober up in a matter of seconds. 

Senses

                Lily’s senses are supplemented by her telepathy allowing her to iron sight something from miles off and when combined with a sight can let her spot folks in complete darkness or otherwise obscured.  Otherwise her senses are peak human.

Cardiovascular system

                Lily’s blood carries as much oxygen as anyone else, her body just makes much more efficient use of it.  She can function just fine in high altitude environments and her lungs can filter out any sort of nerve or chemical agent.  In truth chemical weapons just aggravate her immensely.  In addition her blood cells carry an advanced form of platelet that heals skin cells in seconds, torn muscles in minutes, and broken bones in hours (faster if she sets said bones).  She can also hold her breath for hours at a time minimizing her need for SCUBA gear in amphibious operations.  She (like serene) has far higher G tolerance than even the most well trained pilots.

Nervous system

                Lily’s nervous system is highly conductive giving her extreme hand eye coordination and reflexes.  She’s fast enough to dodge gunfire, and is an extreme threat in CQC.  Of course this makes her an incredible shot even without using her other abilities.  Along with her training and unique physiology she can shut down the pain from grievous injuries to keep going for months at a time. 

Brain

                Being a telepath Lily has a highly developed limbic system, she’s able to perceive emotions (both her own and others) far more clearly than even the most gifted interrogators.  She can supplant this to any of her normal five senses able to see, hear, touch, taste, and feel (tactile sense of course) emotion and thought.  The more powerful emotion the longer it lingers and some emotions are easier to find than others.  In addition she can stealth herself from telepathic inquiry, not so much a shield as an invisibility to telepathic detection as well as psychic invisibility.  In addition she possesses far greater 3-d situational awareness than most people, likely due to the fact she’s a teleporter. 

Career

                Lily has been a soldier since 1966 fresh out of army training she (or rather he at the time) was in an airborne army unit serving with the Australian parachute regiment during The Tet offensive.  It was during the battle of Kham Duc that her star truly shone.  She saved Captain John white of the 11th mobile strike force from a viet cong infiltrator, and in spite of the disaster that was kham duc she is credited with sniping an NVA commander outside of the city a shot from 2000 meters with a L1A1 self loading rifle.  This not only earned her several commendations but selection into the special air services.  However this was not before she saw action trying to hold the line during the Tet offensive where she is credited with saving hundreds of lives, her covering fire constantly peppering the Vietcong.  It was a tough decision for high command to lose such a sure shot but by the winter of 1968 she was on a plane back home to begin training with the SAS.  Taking the training even further she was trained as part of an elite unite of war mages known as the order of the orb.  The order of the orb or “utility mages” as they are more commonly known are a subset of british war mages well trained enough to contend with the rest of the worlds super soldiers.  The order of the orb focuses on utility magic spells and charms that aid their squads in battle by acting as a force multiplier or by misdirecting the enemy.  Lily showed great aptitude in a subset of lumiomancy that dealt with illusion magic.  Once her training was complete and it became clear that Vietnam was going to be unwinnable the powers that be decided she would be better utilized in Northern Ireland instead.  She was part of Operation Banner and from the parts of her record not completely obscured by black ink and mystic wards was involved in several operations against the most extreme branch of the Provisional IRA the Tuatha de Daunan famed for extreme secretarial violence, drawing high profile public support, and the public execution of “collaborators” to the British.  Despite her resourcefulness the Tuatha’s popular support and growing campaign of violence against the English, “unclean people” and Irish protestants stretched her and her team to the limit.  Then on May 5th 1987 the tuatha carried out a bombing of the Chunnel resulting in several deaths among them the children of then Prime Minister Margaret Thatcher and the children of several members of parliament.  This led to several events, first the provisional IRA cut any and all ties to the Tuatha and went to ground, second the british showed off one of their answers to nuclear proliferation throughout the world.  A week after the bombing forty challenger tanks appeared out of nowhere in Belfast and started leveling any building suspected of holding anyone associated with the IRA, minutes after that a full regiment of Royal Marines similarly appearing out of nowhere stormed every nook and cranny of northern Ireland killing or capturing any and all IRA members (or at that point anyone who looked at them sideways) in a campaign of rapid and often imprecise violence.  Lily and her team were deployed to the U.S. to ensure that stateside logistics were taken care of as well.  It was an operation that not only saw several remaining members of the state side IRA and the river rats and westies dead but a U.S. senator forcibly retired and then killed in the Adirondacks.  This operation among certain revelations of the U.S.’ conduct during Vietnam is credited among intelligence circles to the disbanding of NATO and the establishment of the European Federation and New Commonwealth formed by the U.K, Ireland, and Canada by 1989.  What remained of the IRA was rather eager to get into the peace process after the operation concluded deals were struck that included political concessions and prisoner exchange for reconstruction agreements.  A peaceable accord was likely brokered due to the threat of the Soviet Union and NATO’s disbanding.  After the troubles started winding down Lily was reassigned to MI:6 whereupon the seal on her powers placed by her father failed.  Since her abilities are mutant and thus have a biological component she had to endure hours of agony as her body grew new tissue to accommodate her abilities.  A full investigation was conducted into her post human capabilities and MI:6 was quite pleased to have such a versatile and well trained asset at its disposal.  She was used to great effect in a number of operations across several countries in the U.S., U.S.S.R., European Federation, China, Iran, Iraq, Afghanistan, Saudi Arabia, Nigeria, South Africa, Libya, and Mexico.  Through it all she was unquestioningly loyal, a vigilant shadow in her majestey’s name and her father couldn’t have been prouder.  However on a simple delivery mission to Saudi Arabia she saw something that changed her forever in the fall of 1992.  The mission was unusually straight forward, guard duty for a simple delivery but the details of the mission simply didn’t add up.  Throughout her career she had been tasked with the most difficult, most impossible, most high level missions MI:6 could offer and now she was being tasked with guarding a tanker ship full of what the manifest claimed was “miscellaneous goods”.  Her handler was rather brusque about the mission as well insisting that she “don’t mind the details and just get the job done.”  Then there were the other security measures for the ship, telepathic jammers, teleportation scramblers, and a crew of thirty mercs armed with high tech melee weapons instead of guns was even more off putting.  Her skill in espionage led her to disable the jammers long enough to see what the cargo really was.  Mutant girls, all adolescent and implanted with cybernetic behavior regulators, with Afghanistan’s fall and Iran joining the U.S.S.R. and the U.S. establishing a major presence in Isreal the rest of the Arab world wanted to enhance its standing superhuman forces, with the region’s stance on magic being what it was combat mages were a no go but mutants on the other hand could be bred.  Whoever supplied these children (five hundred in all) also fitted them with cybernetic regulators to make them compliant and included medical faculties and equipment to maximize mutant birth rates.  Five hundred adolescent girls with a wide range of post human abilities were essentially sold into sexual slavery something Lily could not abide.  So Lily did the only thing she could do, she shot her handler twice in the head, twice in the chest and proceeded to systematically execute the rest of the security detail.  The mercs stood little chance against a solder with her experience and training, with her post human abilities it could scarcely be called a fight.  As the smoke cleared, and as she had just made herself an enemy of the state she started to consider her options, everything looked rather grim until one of the cargo containers burst open and out stepped a man who was number 3 on the world’s most wanted list, Andrew Clay.  Clay said he had a plan to get the children to safety and thanks to contacting a group of folks dedicated to fighting human trafficking and exploitation was able to make good on his offer.  He managed to get the children to safety after a year of work, and then vowed to return to Saudi arabia to “set things right”.  With that Lily thought it would be best if she started running as by then she was surely blacklisted and placed at the top of MI:6’s shit list.  Andrew made good on his promise to pay Saudi Arabia a visit and proceeded to incite a revolution that overthrew the monarchy and saw it replaced with a parliamentary body (more on that later).  She’s been on the run since then and even after the world ended MI:6 (or rather what’s left of it) is still intent on hunting her down.

 

Skill set

                It should be noted that Lily has close to fifty years of combat experience before her powers were returned to her and training from some of the finest special forces the world has ever seen including but not limited to the Special Air Services, GIGN, Sheteyet 13, GSG9, GROM, EKO Cobra, Mossod, ASIS, DSGE, and Joint Task Force 2, MI6, MI5, and has extensive knowledge of CIA tactics and procedures.  She is a master when it comes to special operations and spycraft.  Though possessed of numerous skills (possessing a rating with anything that holds a bullet or a blade) she is a peerless sniper and demolitionist.  Years fighting the IRA led her to adopt their IED work into her own skills which she then refined throughout her career.  She is highly proficient (rating black E4) in Krav Maga an Israeli martial art that emphasizes bringing an opponent down as quickly and efficiently as possible.  She has worked extensively with Serene to further refine and hone her skill in krav maga, and combined with her superhuman attributes she can mow through groups of C+ to a single B rated super with little effort.  She is proficient in making IED’s from spare parts and household items, something she picked up during operations in Northern Ireland.  She is fluent (conversational level) in several languages (Russian, Chinese, Spanish, Irish, Afrikans, French, German, Arabic, Farsi, Romanian, Croatian, Polish, Japanese, Urdu, Vietnamese, American sign language, military sign) and can affect several regional dialects.  She can bluff with the best of them thanks to years at MI:6, and is astoundingly resourceful.  In addition she is a talented illusionist both mundane and mystic means of misdirection are available to her. Insubstantial clones, invisibility, phantom sounds, lights, and obscuring mists are readily available to her with effort she can make sabotaged items look and function normally until she decides to release the glamour.  Once that’s done object in question fails in a rather spectacular fashion, she normally saves this little trick for key parts of enemy infrastructure or equipment.  As a fully credited utility mage she can quick cast spells even in the midst of a fire fight.  In addition to helping her with krav maga, serene also helped refine her understanding of the street, the underworld and the art of the grift, Andrew and Anya taught her how to bolster her telepathic resistance, and I taught her the finer points of combat strategy.  She’s a master at customizing firearms to expand its capabilities, all of her weapons bear her own customizations, fore grips, expanded magazines, custom stocks and sights are all part of her arsenal.  She is an expert in operating a variety of vehicles be it land, sea or air civilian or military.  She has an insane level of knowledge when it comes to firearms and ballistics knowing the exact specifications of every firearm on the planet.  Her expertise allows her to look at a bullet hole and tell what caliber bullet was used, the type of firearm used, the range it was fired at, the type of ammunition used, the modifications on the gun, and the skill of the shooter in a matter of seconds. 

Power Set

                Lily has a diverse set of abilities that make her even more lethal than she already is.  We’ve already explored her strength, speed, and durability so we can focus on her extra normal attributes.  It should be noted that lily only recently got her powers and hasn’t been fully trained in them.  While they’ve she needs proper training in order to fully exploit them something we haven’t had time to do.    

Telepathy

                Lily is a C+ level telepath, she is capable of reading minds, sensing minds, shorting synapses via telepathic attack, shielding herself from telepathic detection, and communicating directly with a mind.  She cannot control a person’s thoughts or actions however so it’s not a be all end all for recon.  She has an impressive radius of fifty miles, at max range she can read surface thoughts, half that she can read deeper into what folks prefer not to say out loud, she needs eye contact to plumb someone’s subconscious.  She can tell if someone is under mystic geas or telepathic control as well.  Her telepathic attack works by direct stimulation of a targets pain centers, the resulting synaptic overload will incapacitate or kill even the hardiest of targets.  She has yet to learn how to dial her psychic attack down to incapacitate someone so this tends to be a backup option for her.  Her telepathy even lets her pick up uses of magic, or strong emotions left in an area fairly easily.  Though powerful her skill in telepathy is underdeveloped.  A weaker telepath of greater skill can elude or in some cases overwhelm her.  Though fairly safe from most mind control attempts a sufficiently powerful telepath can control her with considerable effort. Lilly is also capable of telepathic stealth rendering her undetectable to telepathic scans from all but the most powerful of telepaths.

Teleportation

                Lily is a C+ level teleporter giving her a range of fifty miles and preventing the worry of her ending up in something solid.  She can utilize her teleportation abilities offensively devastating living matter by displacing it forcibly.  She can take equipment and clothing with her, but not passengers so sadly she can’t just extract people with a touch.  Her teleportation makes no sound, and produces no light show or any other sort of non standard phenomena.  She simply fades from view and then into view up to fifty miles elsewhere.  She doesn’t even need line of sight to teleport, she describes it as fading away and having an overhead view of where she can go then she simply chooses to fade back in elsewhere.  However significant electromagnetic interference will prevent her teleportation ability, and offensive use of it requires total concentration preventing her from doing anything else.

Shapeshifting

                Lily is a C- shapeshifter able to alter her appearance, and shape but not mass.  She can fool guard dogs, visual inspection, retinal scans, fingerprints, but not DNA scanners.  She can’t form natural weaponry like claws or fangs or the like either.  Nonetheless her shapeshifting abilities in addition to her training have let her infiltrate the most secure buildings. 

Hyper marksmanship

                Lily is capable of making any weapon she holds operate far above its standard operating capabilities.  She can make projectiles fly at around mach fifteen making them capable of tearing reinforced armor apart, curve them around cover, make innocuous items into impromptu homing weapons, shape explosives so they obliterate a single target instead of a group, intercept bullets in mid flight with her own bullets, increase the firing rate of a weapon tenfold, and perform even crazier stunts with them.  It’s a trademark for her and made her one of the most lethal soldiers of the twentieth and likely twenty first century.  She seems to accomplish this by charging whatever she’s holding with a psychokinetic field that drastically alters how they interact with physical laws.  She can even double the clip size of any gun she wields by creating what I surmise are constructs of psionic energy that duplicates the rounds inside of the clip.  As per velocity and damage increase the bigger the round the more “oomph” she can put behind it this includes any weapon system she operates but if she puts too much energy in a round it goes off in her face with disastrous results.  Whenever she “charges” an object to break the laws of physics her eyes and whatever she’s holding tend to arc with a silver electrical field depending on the amount of energy she’s putting into something.

Combat

                Each of us have our own ways of dealing heaps of ultra violence on people, Serene has moves that make the matrix seem like amateur hour mcdajang “karate”, ED hits hard enough to red line the richter scale, Andrew will eat punches, stab wounds, bullets, and more and keep going, Anya looks like a ballerina or a whirlwind of claws and spikes, hecryn takes ridiculous risks that sees his enemies wind up as smears, I hit people when they can’t see me and harder when they can, and Verick sits back and lets his minions do the work.  Lily can best be termed as “anti climactic” one to the head and move on is her style of combat, just brutal economy of motion in dispatching anyone stupid enough to take a shot at her.  Krav Maga, years of weapon training and her own superhuman attributes makes her practically capable of winning world war 3 on her own.  As part of a unit she’s even more dangerous. 

Personality

                It bears mentioning that ninety nine percent of human kind has no clue what this woman has been through.  Being at war for close to forty years has made her salty, terse, laconic, unapologetic, and plainspoken on leave.  She doesn’t hold anything back no matter who she speaks to, unless she’s working someone she has a difficult time relating with people.  She does have traces of warmth though, a soft spot for the honest working man or any generally decent folk despite being born and raised a blue blood.  The suffering of regular people under the thumb of the influential is something she has a major problem with and is likely why she chose to join us.  Add in a great deal of cynicism and you’ve essentially got a porcupine with a heart of gold (and a concealed weapon somewhere on her person).  On mission lily is the epitome of cold calculating patience, as one of the best snipers on the planet she can wait for weeks, even month for the perfect opportunity to strike.  As per ethics Lily is essentially occam’s razor when she’s in a good mood, when she’s pissed she’ll find a way to make the offending party suffer for the rest of their lives.  She doesn’t always kill a scumbag, she will cripple them though.  Lily has spent her years on the run from people she trusted, it makes her slow to open up to people but there’s nothing more she values than a friend, which is sad considering how hard it is for her relate to most people.  A realist by nature she is often the one who points out the potential problems with our various plans and generally keeps our feet on the ground when we start getting too ambitious.  Lily may come off as an alcoholic with how much she drinks, but it simply takes way more alcohol to get her buzzed than a normal person.  That said she certainly does have a taste for beer, wine, and spirits and even brews her own sometimes though it tends to have quite a kick to it.  Lily believes in being prepared for anything, when she goes out she always has it in mind to blend with whatever the local populace is.  At any time she has a concealable blade, a flask (filled with water or booze) an E-cig, and playing cards.  Most of these items she keeps hidden via illusion magic.   

Tactical considerations

                Lily is part of the “shadow ops” of the Templar, she’s normally in the field with Serene while Anya is on backup and I normally run ops.  She has decades of experience in special ops and spycraft so she is typically the field leader in any shadow op we have to run.  Both her and Serene can infiltrate just about anything, mark targets of opportunity and leave before anyone is the wiser.  They are both proficient at socially engineering folks to flip all but the most willful of personnel.  With her powers in addition to her training she’s an extremely potent asset in any capacity. 

Team Relations

Niran “serene” Klahan

The two of them working together are the best field agents any covert ops runner could ask for.  They can slip into any building or organization, map it, and under most circumstances get out.  She has been Niran’s fuck buddy, confidant, and partner in crime.  The two of them and Anya like to stir up all sorts of trouble when on leave.  Niran and Lily are for lack of a more delicate term fuck buddies our work tends to invite loads of tension and we all have different ways of working it off.  Ed’s a soulless killing machine, Verrick don’t care, Andrew prays and meditates, Anya and hecryn have seen it all before but Niran and Lily well the fuck every now and again.  Frankly as long as it doesn’t interfere with our mission it’s all well and good.  Lily describes Niran’s mind as open inviting and intoxicating like a fly trap the strength of his emotions and sensory input can trap an unwary visitor in his mind.

EOD01

Lily has an outlook of concern when it comes to ED in action, it’s not every day you see someone use a whole sky scraper as a melee weapon or chuck a mountain.  She has described Ed’s mind as “simple, focused on survival more than anything else but there are some odd bits starting to show up.” 

Andrew Clay

Like all of us Lily thinks the world of Andrew, it was him that managed to get those mutant girls to safe homes instead of letting them become sex slaves.  She is determined to see Andrew’s vision of a finer world come to pass, a world where people like her won’t be necessary.  Lily describes andrew’s mind as an overwhelmingly bright light.  Like staring point blank into a quasar with a choral chant of infinite volume. 

Verrick Bulat

It’s not every day one gets to work with someone with a kill count that would make Hiencrich Himmler jealous.  Verrick is a monster and Lily knows it, hell we all know it but he’s indispensible to our stratagems so we tolerate him.  The actions of Verricks empire hit Lily closer than any of us since her old man actually fought Verricks armies back in the day.  Verrick for his part thinks of Lily as one more weapon to be utilized though his attitude is softening.  Verricks mind has been described as sinister beyond imagining a primordial darkness that invokes terrors long forgotten in the mind of any who visit.

Hecryn

Lily’s drinking buddy and smoking partner, you’d think they’d be fucking on a regular basis but fucking seems to be the furthest thing from either of their minds when they get together.  They compare scars, missions, tactics, and more.  Lily taught Hecryn how to use guns, and Hecryn instructed Lily in swordplay and archery which is far more useful than one would think.  In spite of how he conducts himself on and off the battlefield lily describes hecryns mind as constantly weighing options and risks.  Almost like a calculator.

Hector

We get each other, plain and simple she was SAS I was Delta we both are cut from the same cloth.  Athena has some foolish idea that I have feelings for her but frankly its absurd.  Lily is an asset and team member and she sees me the same way.  We have a job to do, and a damn worthwhile one too, I can put my heart on hold to see this thing through and so can she.  She describes my mind as simple at first glance but with countless facets and paths beneath the surface.  She says it’s fascinating to see it in action it’s flattering I guess.

Anya

If I had a shot for every time I heard “Fuck’s sake Anya get your sodding tits off the back of my head you knob” it would likely overwhelm my synthetic parts and cause me to shut down.    Anya likes to play little “pranks” on Lily and considering the world’s most dangerous predator going up against the world’s most well trained soldier makes for some classic fucking theatre.  They have this weird little relationship where one minute they’re bickering like kids and the next they’re in lock step with each other.  I’ve got dozens of PHD’s and doctorates, an augmented reality display that can make micro expressions as plain as day, and years of experience profiling folks, but damned if I can figure that shit out.  Lily says anya’s mind is like a child at play, even when she’s ripping someone in half. 

 

Equipment

                Lily has a number of guns and other assorted weaponry at her disposal, she favors function over modern tech so she only uses a few modern firearms.  She has eschewed modern charge weaponry for more familiar ballistics by and large.  The most used items in her arsenal are listed below.

Accuracy international A.W. 50

                A lovingly customized sniper rifle that pitches .50 BMG rounds at astonishing velocity, Lily has customized the rifle to convert it to a semi automatic configuration instead of the bolt action.  Enchantments in the chamber touches the propellant causing them to burn more completely and expand smoother resulting in a much higher muzzle velocity.  The sight is a british technomancy innovation known as a “Willow wisp” sight.  This nifty gadget can see living things through solid matter and instantly analyzes a person’s vital organs.  The magazine has been expanded as well holding ten rounds instead of the normal five.  An ingenious system of structural braces further dampens the already minimal recoil and another system of enchantments eliminates noise and muzzle flare.  The final enchantment on the gun allows the bullets to phase through solid inorganic matter and slide right into the squishy person underneath or behind.  The bullet will only phase through an inch of solid matter, after that physics takes over.

 

SA80E

                A venerable model of British assault rifle the SA80E is being phased out in favor of newer models.  The SA80E is a jack of all trades assault rifle, but with lily’s modifications it truly shines.  The foregrip and collapsible stock makes it very controllable in even the tightest of spaces further taking advantage of its bullpup design, and the reflex sight makes it ideally suited for close to mid range engagements.  Enchantments take hop up and recoil out of the gun and the expanded magazine allows for longer engagements.  The other enchantments and mechanical enhancements make the gun more rugged and robust able to take incredible abuse and punishment while operating perfectly.  She normally keeps a magazine on the rail and several combi magazines as well. 

Neosted 2000 c

                A compact magazine fed shotgun originating from South Africa lily has modified it extensively to pack even more of a punch than a normal shotgun.  This thing is not subtle every enchantment is centered around generating terrific muzzle velocity and impact force.  The enhanced force behind it requires someone with at least D rank strength to use one handed.  She has reinforced the weapon to withstand the force of the weapons recoil.  She keeps all manner of ammunition around for it as well, flechette, breaching, solid slug, rock salt, dragons breath, and so forth. 

Sig saur p226

                Wielded alone with an extended magazine this is essentially lily’s last resort firearm.  Enchanted to eliminate noise and muzzle flash and reinforced to withstand being used as a bludgeon and endure all manner of environments these are essentially the old faithful of lilly’s armory.

Compound bow

                It seems out of place for Lily to have a bow and arrow in her arsenal unless you consider the advantages a bow has, completely silent without magic or extra equipment, and retrievable ammo are still something firearms can’t do.  Furthermore some things just laugh when they get tiny little holes punched in them.  Lily’s bow has been modified to take advantage of her strength, the bow has a ten ton draw strength and is enchanted to bestow its arrows with a means to silence the sonic boom they cause when they fly as fast as they do.  The result of these arrows hitting someone is like watching princess mononoke. 

 

GE M134 minigun

                No subtlety here just good old American opposite of subtlety, enchanted to redirect heat into thermovoltaic cells the gun can fire ad nauseum as long as it has ammunition.  She has it belt fed and has a back pack unit that has been extensively modified to store ammunition extra dimensionally.  The backpack can hold ten thousand rounds at any given time before having to call upon more.  The rest of the ammunition is stored extra dimensionally and reloading the entire backpack unit takes thirty miniutes between full firing cycles.

 

Type 6 Rifle Resistant armor

                Commissioned from the European Federtion’s Lux Omnia Vinci initiative as a reward for helping secure some rather elusive assets this rifle resistant armor doesn’t stop bullets at all.  Using light manipulation technology the armor essentially baffles the perception of any around this has two benefits.  One it bestows a sort of psychic invisibility meaning everyone simply looks past or ignores her when she wears it.  Two when found the armor lets loose a sort of chaff that works on multiple modes of perception.  Sight, smell, hearing, even more exotic forms of detection are baffled subtly making would be gunmen or assailants miss by mere inches.  As anything more would immediately put an experienced shooter on guard and lead them to adjust their aim the wearer must still intelligently utilize cover to maximize the armor system’s effectiveness. 

Khonshu Tactical Hood

                A tactical hood that scrambles any facial recognition, thermal or x ray cam, or scrying and psychomancy attempts.  It also warps the wearer’s voice into something exceedingly menacing, projecting dominance and making even the most resolute gunmen lose their focus and their nerve.  The mask also lets the wearer see as if he or she is in a well lit room and can eliminate the obscuring affects of gas or fog.

Mountain man Camel back

                Capable of holding ten liters of water in an extra dimensional space taking a good deal of weight off of the soldier, it is enchanted to keep the liquid cold.  Nine times out of ten instead of water the camelback holds a sort of witch’s brew made by Commonwealth Apothecaries.  A liter can keep a soldier fed and hydrated for a whole day, special forces operators get a more potent variation of the brew called a soldier’s draught that gives them the benefit with just a sip.   Variations exist for different climates and aid a soldier immensely in survival situations.  In addition the brew can be poured on the skin to serve as a salve and disinfectant, and can purify rotten food.  It won’t close a bullet hole but it’ll make it a hell of a lot more bearable.
